nushi_hikou_0005_phone_02:
So from what I gather, seems like the Open Sky
Titan lives somewhere up on this mountain...[VAR 0114(0006)]
nushi_hikou_0005_phone_03:
But there are all these crazy boulders raining
down from the mountain, too!\c
It’s gonna be a little tricky to stand around and
look for the Titan while dodging all those.[VAR 0114(0006)]
nushi_hikou_0005_phone_04:
I think you’ll be sent flying if you get hit by a
falling boulder—but maybe you could power\r
your way through atop that brute of yours![VAR 0114(0006)]
